caption: REPLACE me with a short, human friendly name of the event class.
category: REPLACE me with the category name. For example, network_activity.
description: REPLACE me with a concise description of the events that the event_class will be describing.
name: REPLACE me with a name of the event class. It must be unique within the category. The name is all lower case letters, combine words using underscore.
uid: REPLACE me with an INTEGER, it must be unique within the category.

attributes.DELETE ME: Ensure you adjust 'group' & 'requirement' for all the attributes as desired.

attribute_1.description: REPLACE me with an overridden description of an attribute, IF NEEDED.
